LanguageData.Frame_AnimalBed.label: eläimen sänky (rakennus)
LanguageData.Frame_AnimalBed.description: A soft sänky for animals to sleep on. Fits any animal.
LanguageData.Frame_AnimalSleepingBox.label: eläimen sleeping box (rakennus)
LanguageData.Frame_AnimalSleepingBox.description: A small box for animals to sleep in. Fits smaller animals like chickens, cats, or small dogs.
LanguageData.Frame_AnimalSleepingSpot.label: eläimen nukkumapaikka (rakennus)
LanguageData.Frame_AnimalSleepingSpot.description: Designates a spot on the ground where animals should sleep.
LanguageData.Frame_Armchair.label: armchair (rakennus)
LanguageData.Frame_Armchair.description: A large, soft, comfy seat. Great for relaxation.
LanguageData.Frame_Autodoor.label: autodoor (building)
LanguageData.Frame_Autodoor.description: Divides rooms. Powered operation allows people to move through the door without slowing down.
LanguageData.Frame_Battery.label: battery (building)
LanguageData.Frame_Battery.description: Stores electricity when there is excess power and yields it when there is not. Warning - charged batteries tend to explode when exposed to rain or fire.
LanguageData.Frame_Bed.label: sänky (rakennus)
LanguageData.Frame_Bed.description: Lepäämiseen tarkoitetut kodikkaat lakanat ja patja rungon päällä.
LanguageData.Frame_BilliardsTable.label: billiards table (building)
LanguageData.Frame_BilliardsTable.description: A soft-topped bounded table for playing a variety of billiards-type games.
LanguageData.Frame_Brewery.label: brewery (building)
LanguageData.Frame_Brewery.description: A work station with all the equipment needed to brew beer.
LanguageData.Frame_Campfire.label: campfire (building)
LanguageData.Frame_Campfire.description: Cooks meals and produces heat. Burns out after a few days. As with all heat sources, it must be placed indoors so it has a closed space to heat. Refuelable.
LanguageData.Frame_CaravanPackingSpot.label: caravan packing spot (building)
LanguageData.Frame_CaravanPackingSpot.description: Designates a spot where caravans will be formed.
LanguageData.Frame_CarpetBlue.label: blue carpet (building)
LanguageData.Frame_CarpetCream.label: cream carpet (building)
LanguageData.Frame_CarpetDark.label: dark carpet (building)
LanguageData.Frame_CarpetGreen.label: green carpet (building)
LanguageData.Frame_CarpetRed.label: red carpet (building)
LanguageData.Frame_ChessTable.label: chess table (building)
LanguageData.Frame_ChessTable.description: The ancient game of kings. Fun for a few hours here and there, even playing alone.
LanguageData.Frame_CommsConsole.label: comms console (building)
LanguageData.Frame_CommsConsole.description: Allows radio contact with remote traders as well as other factions for trade and diplomacy.
LanguageData.Frame_Concrete.label: concrete (building)
LanguageData.Frame_Cooler.label: cooler (building)
LanguageData.Frame_Cooler.description: An electrical device that fits into a wall and pushes cold air into a room. Its exhaust port generates a lot of heat. Can be used to cool down rooms during summer, or to create a walk-in freezer.
LanguageData.Frame_CraftingSpot.label: crafting spot (building)
LanguageData.Frame_CraftingSpot.description: A place for crafting simple things like shivs or bows.
LanguageData.Frame_CryptosleepCasket.label: cryptosleep casket (building)
LanguageData.Frame_CryptosleepCasket.description: A self-powered sarcophagus designed to keep a person in a state of suspended animation for many years.
LanguageData.Frame_DeepDrill.label: deep drill (building)
LanguageData.Frame_DeepDrill.description: A deep-crust drilling rig for extracting minerals from deep under the surface. Use a ground-penetrating scanner to detect the resources.
LanguageData.Frame_DiningChair.label: dining chair (rakennus)
LanguageData.Frame_DiningChair.description: A comfortable and attractive chair for sitting at a table.
LanguageData.Frame_Door.label: door (building)
LanguageData.Frame_Door.description: Divides rooms. Must be manually opened and closed, which slows people down.
LanguageData.Frame_DoubleBed.label: double sänky (rakennus)
LanguageData.Frame_DoubleBed.description: A simple double-wide sänky that fits two people.
LanguageData.Frame_DrugLab.label: drug lab (building)
LanguageData.Frame_DrugLab.description: A work bench equipped with various containers, heaters, and measurement equipment for producing a variety of drugs.
LanguageData.Frame_ElectricCrematorium.label: electric crematorium (building)
LanguageData.Frame_ElectricSmelter.label: electric smelter (building)
LanguageData.Frame_ElectricSmelter.description: Extracts usable metal from slag chunks and other mixed metal items. Consumes a lot of power.
LanguageData.Frame_ElectricSmithy.label: electric smithy (building)
LanguageData.Frame_ElectricSmithy.description: An electric-powered station equipped for smithing non-mechanical weapons and tools.
LanguageData.Frame_ElectricStove.label: electric stove (building)
LanguageData.Frame_ElectricStove.description: An electrically-powered stove with an attached countertop for preparing meals.
LanguageData.Frame_ElectricTailoringBench.label: electric tailor bench (building)
LanguageData.Frame_ElectricTailoringBench.description: A workbench with a sewing machine for rapid tailoring of clothes. Can work without electricity at 40% of normal speed.
LanguageData.Frame_FermentingBarrel.label: fermenting barrel (building)
LanguageData.Frame_FermentingBarrel.description: A barrel for fermenting raw wort into beer.
LanguageData.Frame_FirefoamPopper.label: firefoam popper (building)
LanguageData.Frame_FirefoamPopper.description: When touched by fire or triggered by hand, this pops and sprays a fire-extinguishing foam in a circular field around itself.
LanguageData.Frame_FlagstoneGranite.label: granite flagstone (building)
LanguageData.Frame_FlagstoneLimestone.label: limestone flagstone (building)
LanguageData.Frame_FlagstoneMarble.label: marble flagstone (building)
LanguageData.Frame_FlagstoneSandstone.label: sandstone flagstone (building)
LanguageData.Frame_FlagstoneSlate.label: slate flagstone (building)
LanguageData.Frame_FueledSmithy.label: fueled smithy (building)
LanguageData.Frame_FueledSmithy.description: A wood-fueled station equipped for smithing non-mechanical weapons and tools.
LanguageData.Frame_FueledStove.label: fueled stove (building)
LanguageData.Frame_FueledStove.description: A simple wood-fueled stove with an attached countertop for preparing meals.
LanguageData.Frame_GeothermalGenerator.label: geothermal generator (building)
LanguageData.Frame_GeothermalGenerator.description: Produces electricity from geothermal steam geysers. Must be placed on a geyser.
LanguageData.Frame_GoldTile.label: gold tile (building)
LanguageData.Frame_Grave.label: grave (building)
LanguageData.Frame_Grave.description: Place the dead in graves to give them a decent final resting place. Colonists will visit full graves to gain meditative joy.
LanguageData.Frame_GroundPenetratingScanner.label: ground-penetrating scanner (building)
LanguageData.Frame_GroundPenetratingScanner.descripti: A downward-facing penetrating radar, combined with sonar and magnetic imagers, allows you to detect (but not identify) minerals buried deep under the surface. Requires a huge amount of electricity.
LanguageData.Frame_HandTailoringBench.label: hand tailor bench (building)
LanguageData.Frame_HandTailoringBench.description: A workbench for tailoring clothes by hand. Works at 50% of the speed of an electric tailoring bench.
LanguageData.Frame_Heater.label: heater (building)
LanguageData.Frame_Heater.description: An electrical device that converts electricity into heat. It can automatically turn itself on or off to reach a specific target temperature.
LanguageData.Frame_HiTechResearchBench.label: hi-tech research bench (building)
LanguageData.Frame_HiTechResearchBench.description: A high-tech bench with computers and electronic measurement equipment. Research is sped up by the high-tech tools. Requires power.
LanguageData.Frame_Hopper.label: hopper (building)
LanguageData.Frame_Hopper.description: Holds resources for use by machines like nutrient paste dispensers.
LanguageData.Frame_HorseshoesPin.label: horseshoes pin (building)
LanguageData.Frame_HorseshoesPin.description: A simple ancient game played with a few horseshoes and a large pin in the ground. Players toss horseshoes from a distance and attempt to get them to land close to or around the pin. It's relaxing, and even trains hand-eye coordination.
LanguageData.Frame_HospitalBed.label: lääkintävuode (rakennus)
LanguageData.Frame_HospitalBed.description: A sänky specially designed for injured people. Improves chance of successful medical work.
LanguageData.Frame_HydroponicsBasin.label: hydroponics basin (building)
LanguageData.Frame_HydroponicsBasin.description: Grows plants quickly in an artificial nutrient bath. Requires power to work; plants will die if power is cut.
LanguageData.Frame_LongRangeMineralScanner.label: long-range mineral scanner (building)
LanguageData.Frame_LongRangeMineralScanner.descriptio: Automatically detects precious minerals like gold or jade in the nearby areas (but not in which it was built). The lumps are found on average once per 30 days within a radius of 30 tiles. Building more than one scanner in the same or nearby areas has little to no effect.
LanguageData.Frame_MarriageSpot.label: marriage spot (building)
LanguageData.Frame_MarriageSpot.description: Designates a spot where marriage ceremonies will take place. Spectators can watch from either side.
LanguageData.Frame_MetalTile.label: metal tile (building)
LanguageData.Frame_MoisturePump.label: moisture pump (building)
LanguageData.Frame_MoisturePump.description: Very slowly removes moisture from nearby terrain, converting marshes or shallow water into dry ground. Does not affect deep water.
LanguageData.Frame_MultiAnalyzer.label: multi-analyzer (building)
LanguageData.Frame_MultiAnalyzer.description: Increases research speed. Needs to be placed near hi-tech research bench. One research bench can be linked to only one multi-analyzer.
LanguageData.Frame_NutrientPasteDispenser.label: nutrient paste dispenser (building)
LanguageData.Frame_NutrientPasteDispenser.description: Synthesizes nutrient paste from organic feedstocks. It consumes less ingredients and time than any other meal production method - but nobody likes eating nutrient paste. Accepts raw food, but not rough plant matter like hay.
LanguageData.Frame_OrbitalTradeBeacon.label: orbital trade beacon (building)
LanguageData.Frame_OrbitalTradeBeacon.description: Required for orbital trading. You can only sell goods that are near an orbital trade beacon. Can be placed indoors.
LanguageData.Frame_PartySpot.label: party spot (building)
LanguageData.Frame_PartySpot.description: Designates a spot where parties will be centered. Parties use an area around the spot.
LanguageData.Frame_PassiveCooler.label: passive cooler (building)
LanguageData.Frame_PassiveCooler.description: A traditional unpowered cooler that works by water evaporation. Will run out and self-destruct after several days.
LanguageData.Frame_PavedTile.label: paved tile (building)
LanguageData.Frame_PlantPot.label: plant pot (rakennus)
LanguageData.Frame_PlantPot.description: Plant decorative flowers here to improve the mood of people nearby.
LanguageData.Frame_PodLauncher.label: pod launcher (building)
LanguageData.Frame_PodLauncher.description: A fueling port for launching one transport pod. Pod launchers can launch as a group - but the launchers must be placed adjacent to each other.
LanguageData.Frame_PowerConduit.label: power conduit (building)
LanguageData.Frame_PowerConduit.description: A set of electrical cables for moving power around. Can be placed under walls and other buildings.
LanguageData.Frame_PowerSwitch.label: power switch (building)
LanguageData.Frame_RoyalBed.label: royal sänky (rakennus)
LanguageData.Frame_RoyalBed.description: A luxurious gold-inlaid sänky fit for the highborn. Very comfy and beautiful. Fits two.
LanguageData.Frame_Sandbags.label: sandbags (building)
LanguageData.Frame_Sarcophagus.label: sarcophagus (building)
LanguageData.Frame_Sarcophagus.description: An ornamented burial receptacle for the honored dead.
LanguageData.Frame_Shelf.label: shelf (rakennus)
LanguageData.Frame_Shelf.description: Items stored in this will not deteriorate, even if outside.
LanguageData.Frame_Ship_Beam.label: ship structural beam (building)
LanguageData.Frame_Ship_Beam.description: A structural beam around which a ship can be constructed.
LanguageData.Frame_Ship_ComputerCore.label: ship computer core (building)
LanguageData.Frame_Ship_ComputerCore.description: A computer core capable of housing a superhumanlike AI who can guide a ship through any challenge.
LanguageData.Frame_Ship_CryptosleepCasket.label: ship cryptosleep casket (building)
LanguageData.Frame_Ship_CryptosleepCasket.description: A cryptosleep casket hardened against the dangers of space. Capable of maintaining a person in cryptosleep for centuries in a space environment and surviving atmospheric re-entry.
LanguageData.Frame_Ship_Engine.label: ship engine (building)
LanguageData.Frame_Ship_Engine.description: An engine capable of launching a ship into orbit and on interstellar trajectories.
LanguageData.Frame_Ship_Reactor.label: ship reactor (building)
LanguageData.Frame_Ship_Reactor.description: Powers a ship on its journey through space.
LanguageData.Frame_SilverTile.label: silver tile (building)
LanguageData.Frame_SimpleResearchBench.label: simple research bench (building)
LanguageData.Frame_SimpleResearchBench.description: A simple bench with writing implements and low-tech scientific tools. Researchers work here to discover new things.
LanguageData.Frame_SleepingSpot.label: nukkumapaikka (rakennus)
LanguageData.Frame_SleepingSpot.description: Määrää paikan maassa, jossa ihmisten kannattaa nukkua. Epämukava.
LanguageData.Frame_SolarGenerator.label: solar generator (building)
LanguageData.Frame_SolarGenerator.description: Produces electricity from sunlight. Does not work in the dark.
LanguageData.Frame_StandingLamp.label: standing lamp (rakennus)
LanguageData.Frame_StandingLamp.description: Standing lamp that lights an area.
LanguageData.Frame_StandingLamp_Blue.label: standing lamp (blue) (rakennus)
LanguageData.Frame_StandingLamp_Blue.description: Standing lamp that lights an area in blue.
LanguageData.Frame_StandingLamp_Green.label: standing lamp (green) (rakennus)
LanguageData.Frame_StandingLamp_Green.description: Standing lamp that lights an area in green.
LanguageData.Frame_StandingLamp_Red.label: standing lamp (red) (rakennus)
LanguageData.Frame_StandingLamp_Red.description: Standing lamp that lights an area in red.
LanguageData.Frame_SterileTile.label: sterile tile (building)
LanguageData.Frame_Stool.label: stool (rakennus)
LanguageData.Frame_Stool.description: A simple platform on which to sit.
LanguageData.Frame_SunLamp.label: sun lamp (rakennus)
LanguageData.Frame_SunLamp.description: Lights an area brightly enough to grow crops, but consumes a huge amount of power. Automatically turns itself off at night.
LanguageData.Frame_TableButcher.label: butcher table (building)
LanguageData.Frame_TableButcher.description: A heavy table for butchering dead creatures into pieces of raw meat.
LanguageData.Frame_TableMachining.label: machining table (building)
LanguageData.Frame_TableMachining.description: A work station for assembling and disassembling machinery such as guns or mechanoid corpses.
LanguageData.Frame_TableSculpting.label: sculptor's table (building)
LanguageData.Frame_TableSculpting.description: A workbench equipped for artistic sculpting.
LanguageData.Frame_TableStonecutter.label: stonecutter's table (building)
LanguageData.Frame_TableStonecutter.description: A work table equipped to cut rough stone into usable blocks.
LanguageData.Frame_TileGranite.label: granite tile (building)
LanguageData.Frame_TileLimestone.label: limestone tile (building)
LanguageData.Frame_TileMarble.label: marble tile (building)
LanguageData.Frame_TileSandstone.label: sandstone tile (building)
LanguageData.Frame_TileSlate.label: slate tile (building)
LanguageData.Frame_ToolCabinet.label: tool cabinet (building)
LanguageData.Frame_ToolCabinet.description: Increases work speed. Needs to be placed near workbench. One workbench can be simultaneously linked to only two tools cabinets.
LanguageData.Frame_TorchLamp.label: soihtu (rakennus)
LanguageData.Frame_TorchLamp.description: Puinen soihtu alueen valaisemiseen. Puuta voidaan automaattisesti lisätä polttoaineeksi. Tuottaa pienen määrän lämpöä.
LanguageData.Frame_TransportPod.label: transport pod (building)
LanguageData.Frame_TransportPod.description: A launchable suborbital-travel cargo pod capable of carrying people, items, or animals. Can be used for transport, surprise attacks, or reinforcing battles.
LanguageData.Frame_TubeTelevision.label: tube television (building)
LanguageData.Frame_TubeTelevision.description: A cathode ray tube display for showing moving pictures with sound. Even on the rimworlds, there is often an old transmitter running something at least marginally interesting.
LanguageData.Frame_Vent.label: vent (building)
LanguageData.Frame_Vent.description: A simple vent for equalizing the temperature between two rooms without allowing people to walk between them.
LanguageData.Frame_VitalsMonitor.label: vitals monitor (building)
LanguageData.Frame_VitalsMonitor.description: Increases patients treatment quality. Needs to be placed adjacent to a medical bed. One medical bed can be linked to only one vitals monitor.
LanguageData.Frame_Wall.label: wall (building)
LanguageData.Frame_Wall.description: An impassable wall. Capable of holding up a roof.
LanguageData.Frame_WindTurbine.label: wind turbine (building)
LanguageData.Frame_WindTurbine.description: A wind-powered electrical generator. Requires a large clear space in front and behind for optimal air flow.
LanguageData.Frame_WoodPlankFloor.label: wood floor (building)
